entry.name: scale
entry.title: Scale Effect
entry.desc: Shrink or grow an element by a percentage factor.

argument.name: direction
argument.desc: The direction of the effect. Possible values: "both", "vertical" or "horizontal".

argument.name: scale
argument.desc: Which areas of the element will be resized: "both", "box", "content". Box resizes the border and padding of the element; content resizes any content inside of the element.

example.desc: Toggle a div using the scale effect.
example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the box.
